name: Black Butler: Phantom & Ghost
summary: Become the little Earl Ciel or his demon butler Sebastian in this text-based adventure game. Ciel has received an assignment from the Queen to visit her new state in the winter. However, the state is not merely picturesque but contained quite a few spirits and ghosts. This matter alarmed the queen and she commanded her hound, Ciel to look deeper into the matter. During their investigations, the demon butler and his young master met the strange keeper of the lands, the grey magician, and the sleeping beauty. Amidst the hidden memories and dark desires, the ghost appears before Ciel and Sebastian.
